channel.title: Client help for a noob :D
channel.description:
Hey everyone. I'm pretty new to this owning and editing rsps and I have some questions that I would really love to be ansered. Now some of these may be easily fixed but I just can't figure them out. Ok so...
1. On my server I have changed many thing there there are 4 statements that won't change. -teleport to (different server name) home -forums are found at www.prevscape.com [there rly found at prevscape.freeforums.org] -when your finished playing runescape [I want it to say my server name] -www.(different server name).com
Now I have looked in almost all of the different notebook files and can't find them. Is there a cretin section where I can find these in? [yes when searching through the notebook files I click "edit" and "search" so I don't pass the words]
2. When I spawn a item how to I get it to stay when I log out? I know this is prob pretty easy to do so PLZ don't spam me... I just don't know how. I can do npc's (roughy) but not objects
3. How to I make a tele in the spell book go to a different place. Example) say instead of teleing to fally I want to send it to evil bobs island. Or if I just want to add a teleport to a cretin place.
4. How to I put my server on media-fire for people to download (also how do I put it online for the public?)
5. If I have a item that is supposed to be a hat but is used as a wep how do I make it so I can wear it as a hat. Example) I have a gold party hat and when I wear it it says I'm using a weapon
6. Can someone give a link for some good custom items? I have some good customs but I'm looking for some rly crazy and cool items like different color eles and things like that.
Thank you to anyone who can help me with these problems!!! :D

item.title: Client help for a noob :D
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

okk,

[quote=“Prev, post:1, topic:420754”]1. On my server I have changed many thing there there are 4 statements that won’t change. -teleport to (different server name) home -forums are found at www.prevscape.com [there rly found at prevscape.freeforums.org] -when your finished playing runescape [I want it to say my server name] -www.(different server name).com

Now I have looked in almost all of the different notebook files and can’t find them. Is there a cretin section where I can find these in? [yes when searching through the notebook files I click “edit” and “search” so I don’t pass the words][/quote]

This is in your source, so it would be in Client.java

Prev:

2. When I spawn a item how to I get it to stay when I log out? I know this is prob pretty easy to do so PLZ don’t spam me… I just don’t know how. I can do npc’s (roughy) but not objects

This is in your source also, Client.java,

search: addGlobal
and then under there follow the layout, I believe the layout will be:

Obj, X, Y, Z

obj- being the object ID
X being the x location
Y " "
Z " "

Prev:

3. How to I make a tele in the spell book go to a different place. Example) say instead of teleing to fally I want to send it to evil bobs island. Or if I just want to add a teleport to a cretin place.

This would be found in clickingmost.java or clickhandler.java or some shit along those lines.
Look up the coords of where the tele take you, then replace thouse with where you want the tele to go instead.

Prev:

4. How to I put my server on media-fire for people to download (also how do I put it online for the public?)

Are you a clown?

Prev:

5. If I have a item that is supposed to be a hat but is used as a wep how do I make it so I can wear it as a hat. Example) I have a gold party hat and when I wear it it says I’m using a weapon

This should take care of that^:

Prev:

6. Can someone give a link for some good custom items? I have some good customs but I’m looking for some rly crazy and cool items like different color eles and things like that.

Check the Models Section.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help for a noob :D
item.dc:creator: @Prev Prev
item.description:
@Prev wrote:

Hey everyone. I’m pretty new to this owning and editing rsps and I have some questions that I would really love to be ansered. Now some of these may be easily fixed but I just can’t figure them out. Ok so…

  1. On my server I have changed many thing there there are 4 statements that won’t change. -teleport to (different server name) home -forums are found at www.prevscape.com [there rly found at prevscape.freeforums.org] -when your finished playing runescape [I want it to say my server name] -www.(different server name).com

Now I have looked in almost all of the different notebook files and can’t find them. Is there a cretin section where I can find these in? [yes when searching through the notebook files I click “edit” and “search” so I don’t pass the words]

  1. When I spawn a item how to I get it to stay when I log out? I know this is prob pretty easy to do so PLZ don’t spam me… I just don’t know how. I can do npc’s (roughy) but not objects

  2. How to I make a tele in the spell book go to a different place. Example) say instead of teleing to fally I want to send it to evil bobs island. Or if I just want to add a teleport to a cretin place.

  3. How to I put my server on media-fire for people to download (also how do I put it online for the public?)

  4. If I have a item that is supposed to be a hat but is used as a wep how do I make it so I can wear it as a hat. Example) I have a gold party hat and when I wear it it says I’m using a weapon

  5. Can someone give a link for some good custom items? I have some good customs but I’m looking for some rly crazy and cool items like different color eles and things like that.

Thank you to anyone who can help me with these problems!!!

Read full topic
